post:
Hello! TNAHosting is happy to offer some deals on OpenVZ and Dedicated servers. We’ve been in business since 2012, providing a variety of reliable and cost-effective services. All servers are located in Chicago, IL. Dedicated servers have **very** limited stock, so don’t wait too long!  
  
**6GB OpenVZ**  
* 1 IPv4    
* 4x vCore  
* <del>400GB</del> 500GB HDD  
* 15TB Bandwidth  
* $5/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=54) / $4.17/m paid annually - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=54&billingcycle=annually)  
  
**4GB SSD OpenVZ**  
* 1 IPv4    
* 2x vCore  
* _200GB SSD_   
* 10TB Bandwidth  
* $5/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=80) / $4.17/m paid annually - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=80&billingcycle=annually)  
  
**1GB SSD OpenVZ**  
* 1 IPv4    
* 1x vCore  
* 50GB SSD   
* 5TB Bandwidth  
* $15/year - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=81)  
  
**Dual L5420 Dedicated Server**    
* Dual L5420 - 8 Cores @ 2.5GHz  
* 24GB DDR2  
* 2TB HDD (Up to 4 Drives. Additional 2TB @ $5/m)  
* 15TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* /29 IPv4  
* $19/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=12&promocode=Y4R0RQ1L9I)  

**E3-1230v2 Dedicated Server**    
* E3-1230 v2 - 4 Cores / 8 Threads @ 3.3GHz / 3.7GHz Turbo  
* 32GB DDR3  
* 2x 2TB HDD  
* 15TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* /29 IPv4  
* $34/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=72&promocode=E31230V2BF19) 
  
**Raspberry Pi Colocation**  
* Colocation of 1 Raspberry Pi at our Chicago, IL location  
* Ability to include a 2.5" external hard drive at no extra cost  
* 15TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* 1 IPv4 Address   
* $6/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=79&promocode=1I3I50GUWL)    
  
**DirectAdmin Shared Hosting**  
* 5 GB SSD Disk Space  
* Unlimited Bandwidth, Addon Domains, Sub Domains, Email Accounts, MySQL Databases  
* Softaculous  
* Las Vegas, US  
* Let's Encrypt  
* $5/year - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=58)  



Virtual servers are setup instantly after payment. Dedicated servers will be setup within 1-3 business days.  

Chicago Looking Glass: http://lg.chi2.tnahosting.net/

We accept PayPal, Major Credit/Debit Cards (Stripe), and Bitcoin.

Have questions or need something custom? Feel free to PM me or [open a sales ticket](https://tnahosting.net/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2).
